question: What is the theme of 2019 edition of International Day of Radiology (IDoR) ?
explanation: The International Day of Radiology (IDoR) is observed every year on 8th of November to promote the role of medical imaging in modern healthcare. The day coincides with the anniversary of the discovery of x-rays. The 2019 theme \'Sports Imagingâ€™ , focuses on musculoskeletal radiology which plays a crucial role of imaging in the diagnosis, prognosis and treatment of sports injuries.
